comment: Alternate proof of ~ axc16 , shorter but requiring ~ ax-10 , ~ ax-11 , ~ ax-13 and using ~ df-nf and ~ df-sb . (Contributed by NM, 17-May-2008.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
